# The `X86_64ELFTargetObjectFile` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This implementation is used for X86&#95;64 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a> targets, and defers to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86elftargetobjectfile">X86ELFTargetObjectFile</a> for commonalities with 32-bit targets. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

This implementation is used for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a> targets that don&#39;t have a further specialization (and as a base class for X86&#95;64, which does). <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86elftargetobjectfile/#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This implementation is used for X86&#95;64 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/elf">ELF</a> targets, and defers to <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/x86elftargetobjectfile">X86ELFTargetObjectFile</a> for commonalities with 32-bit targets.
